Type.Name: CellRendererState

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CellRendererState extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Tells how a cell is to be rendered.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.CellRendererState Focused = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The cell currently has the keyboard focus.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.CellRendererState Insensitive = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The cell is drawn in an insensitive manner.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.CellRendererState Prelit = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The mouse is hovering over the cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.CellRendererState Selected = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The cell is currently selected, and probably has a selection colored background to render to.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.CellRendererState Sorted = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The cell is in a sorted row.
